column6: Old offenders Convicted in the Past Once - Count (Col. 6)
column7: Old offenders Convicted in the Past Once - Percentage to Total (Col. 7)
column8: Old offenders Convicted in the Past Twice - Count (Col. 8)
column9: Old offenders Convicted in the Past Twice - Percentage to Total (Col. 9)
column10: Old offenders Convicted in the Past Thrice or More - Count (Col. 10)
column11: Old offenders Convicted in the Past Thrice or More - Percentage to Total (Col. 11)
column12: Old offenders Convicted in the Past - Percentage of Recidivists (Col. 12) = Col. {(7)+(9) +(11)}
